title: Long ticket response time.
body: Usually I get a response when i submit a ticket within 1-2 days. My last one is closing up to a week at this point. Anyone else having longer wait time?

replies.body: We've been a bit behind in our queues but you should get a response sometime today.
Is it due to a specific issue? Like High volume due to "..."?  Lack of Support? Bug?

> [{quoted}](name=AIQ,realm=NA,application-id=okOuNvuT,discussion-id=Ezgw0YcA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-02-13T19:38:41.990+0000)
>
> Is it due to a specific issue? Like High volume due to "..."?  Lack of Support? Bug?

No specific issues but just a high inquiry volume. We're working vigilantly to get back to our normal response times!
Do tickets get handled on a first come, first served basis or do certain types of tickets get addressed before others? Are you allowed to share how the process works?

> [{quoted}](name=shakesd33,realm=NA,application-id=okOuNvuT,discussion-id=Ezgw0YcA,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-14T05:53:00.340+0000)
>
> Do tickets get handled on a first come, first served basis or do certain types of tickets get addressed before others? Are you allowed to share how the process works?

First come first serve. We do have teams split up by discipline so generally our higher queues (PB/Accounts) get backed up way more than some others (Tech).
Thanks for the information, much appreciated.
IIRC, NA Player Support sorts their tickets by creation/request date. This system varies from region to region.

Um if there are any people that can help me with my ticket, May I please get some help with my issue. Because realistically the problem started about a week ago and its a payment issue. I have paid quite a bit of money and i have not seen any RP in my account which, to be honest, makes me a little bit mad because I followed all the instructions
Ticket number: (#45164249)
